name: VideoGate – Video Showcase Plugin
author: servigate

sections.description:
VideoGate is a user-friendly WordPress video plugin to showcase your videos. You can embed both youtube and vimeo videos.

Third Party Resource

This plugin use plyr.js library which is depended on google IMASD service to display google ads.
sections.installation:
Itâ€™s pretty easy to set up videogate plugin by following steps below.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/videogate directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. go to videogate -> click add new video and publish your video.
  4. use [videogate_videos column=”2″] to display video on any page, second parameter is to set column by default is 2 column while you can set up to 6 columns.
sections.faq:
Can i embed videos on my website?

Yes

support youtube videos?

yes

support vimeo videos?

yes
